affects:
ABILITY: Unit Target
AFFECTS: Enemy Units
DAMAGE TYPE: Magical
PIERCES SPELL IMMUNITY: No
desc: Focuses Enigma's power on a target, causing it to take damage and become repeatedly stunned for multiple instances.  An instance strikes every 2 seconds.
cmb:
110/130/150/160
15
lore: Strange gravities pull at the core of those who would oppose you, holding them in place.
name: enigma_malefice

desc: Transforms a creep into three fragments of Enigma himself.  These eidolons are all under Enigma's control, and repeated successful attacks cause them to multiply.  When this happens, the eidolons have their health restored.
notes: Converted enemy units will give gold bounty and experience.
attrib:
ATTACKS TO MULTIPLY: 6/6/6/6
EIDOLON HP: 180/200/220/240
EIDOLON DAMAGE: 20/28/38/47
DURATION: 35
cmb:
170/170/170/170
35
lore: Enigma is capable of drawing aspects of himself from other dimensions - the result is a trio of dark eidolons that hunt the corporeal plane.
name: enigma_demonic_conversion

affects:
ABILITY: Point Target
DAMAGE TYPE: Pure
PIERCES SPELL IMMUNITY: Yes
desc: Steeps an area in dark resonance, damaging enemy units based on their max HP.
notes:
Damage goes through spell immunity.
This ability destroys trees in its area.
cmb:
95/110/125/140
35
lore: A section of the world slowly descends into the void.
name: enigma_midnight_pulse

affects:
ABILITY: Channeled, Point Target
DAMAGE TYPE: Magical
PIERCES SPELL IMMUNITY: Yes
desc:
CHANNELED - Summons a vortex that sucks in nearby enemy units. Enemies affected by Black Hole cannot move, attack, or cast spells.
Upgradable by Aghanim's Scepter.
cmb:
275/325/375
200/190/180
lore: The ground trembles as Enigma channels his ultimate vortex of destruction, a singularity with the power to end worlds.
name: enigma_black_hole
